description:
Jonouchi’s last ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith’s zombie monsters.  But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Migi Te ni Tate o Hidari Te ni Ken o
右手に盾を左手に剣を
